metadata.title: CVE-2020-12408 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.description:
When browsing a document hosted on an IP address, an attacker could insertcertain characters to flip domain and path information in the address bar.This vulnerability affects Firefox < 77.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12408` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 77.0.1+build1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
firefox-geckodriver - 77.0.1+build1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 77.0.1+build1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '77.0.1+build1-0ubuntu0.20.04.1').
mozjs52 package in esm-apps/focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
